Map¶

class biosim.map.Map(map_string)¶

Map class which will represent a map containing different cells

Methods

add_animals(self, ini_list)

Adds animals to the map using the specified location and specie type from ini_list

age_all_animals(self)

Ages all animals with one year, using the aging function from ‘cell.py’

all_animals_eat(self)

Feeds all animals on the map using eat_herbivore and eat_carnivore functions from ‘cell.py’

annual_death_all_animals(self)

Checks all animals annual death, by using annual_death from ‘cell.py’

annual_weight_loss_all_animals(self)

Makes all animals lose their annual amount of weigh using the annual_weight_loss function from ‘cell.py’

cycle(self)

Simulates the annual cycle for all animals on the map

get_neighbour(self, loc)

Given a location loc, the get_neighbour function returns the 4 neighbours someone or something can move to.

map_factory(list_to_alter)

A map factory function which transforms a list containing strings into a list containing cell instances.

mate_all_animals(self)

Mates all animals on the map using the mating function from ‘cell.py’

move_all_animals(self)

Moves all animals in the map, using the migration function from ‘cell.py’

num_animals_on_map(self)

Calculates the total amount of animals on the map, by entering each cell and checking how many animals are there.

num_species_on_map(self)

Calculates and returns the total amount of per specie on the map

update_animal_params_all_cells(specie, params)

Updates parameters for specified specie in all cells.

update_param_all_cells(self, landscape, params)

Updates parameters for all cells which are specified to be updated.
static _check_even_string(map_string)¶

Checks if string is even for all lines

add_animals(self, ini_list)¶

Adds animals to the map using the specified location and specie type from ini_list

Parameters
ini_list: list

list which contains location and specie information

age_all_animals(self)¶

Ages all animals with one year, using the aging function from ‘cell.py’

all_animals_eat(self)¶

Feeds all animals on the map using eat_herbivore and eat_carnivore functions from ‘cell.py’

allowed_cells = ['Jungle', 'Savannah', 'Desert']¶
annual_death_all_animals(self)¶

Checks all animals annual death, by using annual_death from ‘cell.py’

annual_weight_loss_all_animals(self)¶

Makes all animals lose their annual amount of weigh using the annual_weight_loss function from ‘cell.py’

cycle(self)¶

Simulates the annual cycle for all animals on the map

dict_cells = {'D': <class 'biosim.cell.Desert'>, 'J': <class 'biosim.cell.Jungle'>, 'M': <class 'biosim.cell.Mountain'>, 'O': <class 'biosim.cell.Ocean'>, 'S': <class 'biosim.cell.Savannah'>}¶
get_neighbour(self, loc)¶

Given a location loc, the get_neighbour function returns the 4 neighbours someone or something can move to.

Parameters
loc: tuple
Returns
neighbour_cells: list

Contains neighbour cells

classmethod map_factory(list_to_alter)¶

A map factory function which transforms a list containing strings into a list containing cell instances.

Parameters
list_to_alter: list

List containing different string letters, which need to be transformed to class types.

Returns
list

Contains cell class instances

mate_all_animals(self)¶

Mates all animals on the map using the mating function from ‘cell.py’

move_all_animals(self)¶

Moves all animals in the map, using the migration function from ‘cell.py’

num_animals_on_map(self)¶

Calculates the total amount of animals on the map, by entering each cell and checking how many animals are there.

Returns
int

The amount of animals on the whole map

num_species_on_map(self)¶

Calculates and returns the total amount of per specie on the map

Returns
int

The amount of herbivores on the map

int

The amount of carnivores on the map

static update_animal_params_all_cells(specie, params)¶

Updates parameters for specified specie in all cells.

Parameters
specie: str

The name of the specie which needs it’s parameters updated

params: dict

Dictionary containing the updated values of the parameters.

update_param_all_cells(self, landscape, params)¶

Updates parameters for all cells which are specified to be updated.

Parameters
landscape: str

The cell type which needs its parameters updated

params: dict

Dictionary containing the new parameters
